attributes.action: Stop the introduction of the new MP's expenses guide lines as set out in the MPs Green Book
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new criteria which is proposed in the MP's green book this week allowing claims without receipts is as bad if not worse than the old system .

Why is this being rushed through with out consultation , MP s are continuing to try to make fools out of the UK public , why is this being allowed to happen .Keep it transparent and may be MP's will get some respect back from the public at large .This will not happen if this is allowed to continue .

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
